body_html: This error often happens if you open a python shell in the base bazel directory. The directory "tensorflow" in there confuses python. Try running python from another directory; let us know if import tensorflow does not work then.
body_text: This error often happens if you open a python shell in the base bazel directory.  The directory "tensorflow" in there confuses python.  Try running python from another directory; let us know if import tensorflow does not work then.
body: This error often happens if you open a python shell in the base bazel directory.  The directory "tensorflow" in there confuses python.  Try running python from another directory; let us know if `import tensorflow` does not work then.
